casebody.data:
GUSSIE MICHELSON GRANTZ v. HERMAN GRANTZ 23 So. (2nd) 383

June Term, 1945

September 25, 1945 Special Division A Rehearing Denied Oct. 19, 1945 Rosenhouse & Rosenhouse, for appellant. John E. Porte, for appellee. *393PER CURIAM:

For final decree granting divorce and dismissing defendant’s counter claim, defendant in the court below has perfected appeal.

The decree was rendered after consideration of voluminous conflicting testimony and evidence by way of exhibits.

There is ample substantial evidence as disclosed by the transcript to support the decree and, therefore, the same is affirmed.

So ordered.

TERRELL, BUFORD, THOMAS and ADAMS, JJ., concur.
